attributes.action: Give advice to the general public as to what measures they can take to minimise/shorten the economic recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is taking firm measures to try to minimise the curent economic problems. These are top-down efforts. They should be coupled with efforts by the general public to create bottom-up solutions. Are we advised to save, spend sensibly, avoid credit, cut back life-style choices etc?
